body_html: Actually, @jkiske , I may have spoken too soon. My reader op works in the tensorflow environment I built myself, but when I test it in the environment where I used the binary install ('pip install tensorflow-gpu'), I get a segmentation fault when I call tf.load_op_library. I would like to distribute this op to others with the binary install, so this is annoying. But it might also be something for you to try if you can't figure out your seg fault.

body: Actually, @jkiske , I may have spoken too soon. My reader op works in the tensorflow environment I built myself, but when I test it in the environment where I used the binary install ('pip install tensorflow-gpu'), I get a segmentation fault when I call tf.load_op_library. I would like to distribute this op to others with the binary install, so this is annoying. But it might also be something for you to try if you can't figure out your seg fault.
